mapper.select: SELECT ATTD_NO, ATTD_DATE, ATTD_STARTH, ATTD_STARTM, ATTD_ENDH, ATTD_ENDM, WS_CODE, MEM_ID, TO_CHAR(ATTD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ||'T'|| ATTD_STARTH ||':'|| ATTD_STARTM AS WORK_START_TIME, TO_CHAR(ATTD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ||'T'|| ATTD_ENDH ||':'|| ATTD_ENDM AS WORK_END_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}

SELECT VACA_NO, TO_CHAR(VACA_BEGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VACA_BEGIN, TO_CHAR(VACA_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VACA_END, B.VT_NAME VT_CODE, A.MEM_ID FROM VACA_REC A LEFT OUTER JOIN VACA_TYPE B ON(A.VT_CODE = B.VT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN APRVL_DOC C ON(A.AD_NO = C.AD_NO) WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND C.DS_CODE = 'COMPLETE'

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') FROM DUAL) -2 ), 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS MON, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') FROM DUAL) -2 )+1, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS TUE, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') FROM DUAL) -2 )+2, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS WED, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') FROM DUAL) -2 )+3, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS THU, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') FROM DUAL) -2 )+4, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS FRI, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') FROM DUAL) -2 )+5, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS SAT, TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-( (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'D') FROM DUAL) -2 )+6, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AS SUN FROM DUAL ) UNPIVOT (WEEKDAY FOR WEEK IN (MON, TUE, WED, THU, FRI, SAT, SUN) ) ) SELECT ROUND((TO_DATE(NVL(ATTD_ENDH,0)||':'||NVL(ATTD_ENDM,0), 'HH24:MI')-(TO_DATE(NVL(ATTD_STARTH,0)||':'||NVL(ATTD_STARTM,0), 'HH24:MI')))*24) AS WORK_TIME , TEMP.WEEK , TEMP.WEEKDAY FROM (SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_ID= #{memId} AND WS_CODE = '2') ATTEND RIGHT OUTER JOIN TEMP ON (ATTD_DATE = TEMP.WEEKDAY)

SELECT NVL(LEFT_DAY,0) - NVL(VACA_DAYS,0) AS LEFT_DAY, NVL(WORK_DAY,0) AS WORK_DAY, NVL(VACA_DAYS,0) AS VACA_DAYS FROM ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN VACA_END>LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) THEN TRUNC(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) - VACA_BEGIN)+1 ELSE (VACA_END - VACA_BEGIN)+1 END) VACA_DAYS FROM VACA_REC WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND VACA_BEGIN BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) ) A, ( WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT CAST (TO_CHAR (LAST_DAY (SYSDATE), 'DD') AS INT) AS DAY FROM DUAL) SELECT TEMP.DAY - COUNT(ATTD_DATE) AS LEFT_DAY, COUNT(ATTD_DATE) AS WORK_DAY FROM ATTENDANCE, TEMP WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND ATTD_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))B
